data.comment: The big names in today's match at Neftyanik Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Volgograd at Neftyanik Stadium.
Ufa are pushing forward but Vyacheslav Krotov's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Ufa.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Volgograd.
Ufa drive forward but Vyacheslav Krotov is judged offside.
In the minute 13, Free kick in a good position for Volgograd!
Jemal Tabidze (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Volgograd drive upfield and Evgeniy Pesegov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ufa defender.
In the minute 14, Volgograd's Ilya Zhigulev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Ufa's Timur Zhamaletdinov is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Ufa.
Timur Zhamaletdinov for Ufa is whistled offside.
In the minute 16, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flamarion is booked for the away team.
Ufa's Vyacheslav Krotov has run offside.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 18, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In Ufa Ufa's Vyacheslav Krotov is caught offside.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Ufa to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Vitaly Meshkov waits before resuming play because Cedric Gogoua for Volgograd is still down.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a throw-in for Ufa, close to Volgograd's area.
In the minute 23, Cedric Gogoua returns to the field for Volgograd after picking up a slight injury.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Ufa throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 28, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 30, Cedric Gogoua (Volgograd) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 34, In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kamil Mullin of Volgograd is pulled up for offside.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 36, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Volgograd.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Ufa.
Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
Ufa's Dmitri Sysuev is whistled for offside at Neftyanik Stadium.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Volgograd.
In the minute 44, Konstantin Pliyev for Ufa has been booked by Vitaly Meshkov and receives a first yellow card.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Volgograd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Ilya Zhigulev (Volgograd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Vitaly Meshkov has blown to start the second-half.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 47, Volgograd's Kamil Mullin misses with an attempt on goal.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Ufa a goal kick.
Throw-in Ufa.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Dmitri Sysuev (Ufa) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 50, Volgograd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Ufa.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Ufa throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Free kick Volgograd.
In the minute 52, At Neftyanik Stadium, Oleg Danchenko has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Ufa to check on Cedric Gogoua, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 54, Volgograd's Cedric Gogoua looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 56, Vitaly Meshkov awards Ufa a goal kick.
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Ufa have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, Volgograd needs to be cautious. Ufa have an attacking throw-in.
In Ufa Ufa drive forward through Catalin Carp. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Konstantin Pliyev.
In the minute 60, Volgograd to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Ufa’s Konstantin Pliyev is on his feet again at Neftyanik Stadium.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 61, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ufa have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Volgograd in Ufa.
In the minute 65, Vitaly Meshkov signals a throw-in for Volgograd, close to Ufa's area.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Kirill Kolesnichenko is replacing Ilya Zhigulev for the away team.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Volgograd.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Throw-in for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 68, In Ufa, Vladislav Kamilov (Ufa) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Vyacheslav Krotov's header is off-target for Ufa.
Dmitri Sysuev is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 70, Dmitri Sysuev has recovered and rejoins the match in Ufa.
Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
Ufa to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
In the minute 72, The home team has substituted Dmitri Sysuev with Kirill Folmer. Vadim Evseev is thus making his first change.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Beka Mikeltadze is on a sub for Kamil Mullin for Volgograd.
Volgograd's Flamarion breaks free at Neftyanik Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 75, Ufa are coming forward and Timur Zhamaletdinov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Kirill Kolesnichenko of Volgograd gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 78, Ufa make their second substitution with Lovro Bizjak replacing Vyacheslav Krotov.
Cedric Gogoua is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 79, Volgograd’s Cedric Gogoua is on his feet again at Neftyanik Stadium.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Volgograd.
Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
In the minute 82, Free kick Volgograd.
Azer Aliev is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Kirill Folmer for the home team is judged to be offside.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 84, Patricio Matricardi (Volgograd) has received a first yellow card.
Oleg Aleynik (Volgograd) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Ufa push forward at Neftyanik Stadium and Catalin Carp gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Volgograd defence.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Ufa.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 87, Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
Oleg Danchenko for Ufa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
In the minute 89, The home team replace Azer Aliev with Gamid Agalarov.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Volgograd's Danil Stepanov misses with an attempt on goal.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Ufa a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Ufa.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a throw-in for Ufa, close to Volgograd's area.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oleg Danchenko (Ufa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Ufa just outside Volgograd's area.
Ufa's Catalin Carp goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
The match has come to a close in Ufa. The final score is 0-0.
Evgeniy Pesegov (Volgograd) has received a yellow card from Vitaly Meshkov.
Oleg Nikolaev is on a sub for Flamarion for Volgograd.
Volgograd's Kirill Kolesnichenko has been booked in Ufa.
